text: ql -ayha alrswl- lhwla' aljhlt min almshrkyn: man aladhi hurim ealaykum allbas alhasan aldhy jaealah allah taealaa zynt lkm? wman aladhi hrram ealaykum altmte balhlal altayib min rizq allah teala? qul -ayha alrswl- lhwla' almshrkyn: 'inn ma ahlh allah min almalabis waltayibat min almataeim walmsharb haqa liladhin amanuu fi alhayat aldunya ysharkhm fiha ghyrhm, khalisatan lahum yawm alqyam. mithl dhlk altafsil yfssil allah alayat liqawm yaelamun ma ybyin lhm, wyfqhwn ma yamiz lhm
